ConceptDef.label: WVC - About beds
ConceptDef.description: Beds have limits for body size. This is done to limit them for pawns from KL. However, races that are less than 0.71 or 0.51 can also use them, but this comes with a visual bug.
ConceptDef.helpText: Mod "WVC - Core" adds several beds that are designed for races from the mod "WVC - kemomimilike".\n\nBy default, beds have limits for body size. This is done to limit them for pawns from KL. However, races that are less than 0.71 or 0.51 can also use them, but this comes with a visual bug.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About buildings
ConceptDef.description:
Mod "WVC - Core" adds several walls, doors and floors in different styles. All of them have a huge advantage over vanilla ones and require quite expensive resources in not small quantities.

Logically, they should make the settlement very expensive and attract a huge number of raiders. However, it is not. These buildings have less impact on the price of a settlement than wooden walls.

Why is that? This is because I capped the cost of these buildings to 1 silver, so you can safely build a huge mechanoid-styled complex without fear that it will turn the game into a war against 5 fps.
ConceptDef.helpText:
Mod "WVC - Core" adds several walls, doors and floors in different styles. All of them have a huge advantage over vanilla ones and require quite expensive resources in not small quantities.

Logically, they should make the settlement very expensive and attract a huge number of raiders. However, it is not. These buildings have less impact on the price of a settlement than wooden walls.

Why is that? This is because I capped the cost of these buildings to 1 silver, so you can safely build a huge mechanoid-styled complex without fear that it will turn the game into a war against 5 fps.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About universal fuel
ConceptDef.description:
By default, mechanites are used only as crafting material, food, and for the construction of some buildings. In the setting in the "Resources" tab this can be changed.

However, the important point is that this can be very unbalanced, so use this feature only if you are sure that there is nowhere to break the balance.

For example, with the help of mechanites, you can refuel the "Gene-tailoring Pod" from the "VFE - Ancients" mod and gain access to the essentially endless use of this device. From myself I will say that the balance of this thing is so terrible that the abilities that can be obtained from it are often useless or harmful if not rerolled.
ConceptDef.helpText:
By default, mechanites are used only as crafting material, food, and for the construction of some buildings. In the setting in the "Resources" tab this can be changed.

However, the important point is that this can be very unbalanced, so use this feature only if you are sure that there is nowhere to break the balance.

For example, with the help of mechanites, you can refuel the "Gene-tailoring Pod" from the "VFE - Ancients" mod and gain access to the essentially endless use of this device. From myself I will say that the balance of this thing is so terrible that the abilities that can be obtained from it are often useless or harmful if not rerolled.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About mechanite augmentation
ConceptDef.description:
In the mod "WVC - kemomimilike" there are a number of augmentations created specifically for ELF and Herrscher. These limbs are stronger than bionics but weaker than archotech, but add (to all parts, no exclusions) a mechanites attack that inflicts pain on the victim, with each hit intensifying the pain.

To be able to install these augments, you need 7 mechanite medecine and two technologies "AR.E" and "Bionics".

Maybe in the future the race restriction will be lifted.
ConceptDef.helpText:
In the mod "WVC - kemomimilike" there are a number of augmentations created specifically for ELF and Herrscher. These limbs are stronger than bionics but weaker than archotech, but add (to all parts, no exclusions) a mechanites attack that inflicts pain on the victim, with each hit intensifying the pain.

To be able to install these augments, you need 7 mechanite medecine and two technologies "AR.E" and "Bionics".

Maybe in the future the race restriction will be lifted.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About living form genomen
ConceptDef.description: In the presence of the "VFE - Insectoids" mod, it is used to install mutations, as well as an incubator.\n\nFor ELF incubation, place 3 genomes in the incubator.
ConceptDef.helpText: In the presence of the "VFE - Insectoids" mod, it is used to install mutations, as well as an incubator.\n\nFor ELF incubation, place 3 genomes in the incubator.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About incubator
ConceptDef.description: The main function of an incubator is a spawner. To work correctly, it requires the "Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Dryads" mod, as it uses the framework of this mod.\n\nWithout the KL mod, it will spawn cats. With the presence of the same mod, there will be ELF (One of the races of the mod).
ConceptDef.helpText: The main function of an incubator is a spawner. To work correctly, it requires the "Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Dryads" mod, as it uses the framework of this mod.\n\nWithout the KL mod, it will spawn cats. With the presence of the same mod, there will be ELF (One of the races of the mod).

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About nodes
ConceptDef.description: The main purpose of nodes is to be an intermediate step in crafting resources for archo buildings. However, not wanting to leave them completely useless, I added the ability to use them for dark-archo-styled buildings.
ConceptDef.helpText: The main purpose of nodes is to be an intermediate step in crafting resources for archo buildings. However, not wanting to leave them completely useless, I added the ability to use them for dark-archo-styled buildings.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About royal dryads (Evolution)
ConceptDef.description:
Mod "VIE - Dryads" allows dryads to evolve into a stronger version of them. My mod has support for this mod so dryad girls can evolve into Valkyries, Mothers and ELFs.

Prices for evolution in girls:
ELF - 3
Valkyrie - 5 dryads
Mother - 6 dryads

Humanlike dryad cannot evolve.
ConceptDef.helpText:
Mod "VIE - Dryads" allows dryads to evolve into a stronger version of them. My mod has support for this mod so dryad girls can evolve into Valkyries, Mothers and ELFs.

Prices for evolution in girls:
ELF - 3
Valkyrie - 5 dryads
Mother - 6 dryads

Humanlike dryad cannot evolve.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About royal dryads (Hardwork)
ConceptDef.description: The "VGE" mod, among other things, adds the ability for some hybrids to work. My mod has a compatibility patch so girls can work too.\n\nUnlike hybrids, dryad girls have no job restrictions and can do anything that all human hybrids combined can do. However, the rollback of these capabilities takes longer than specialized hybrids.
ConceptDef.helpText: The "VGE" mod, among other things, adds the ability for some hybrids to work. My mod has a compatibility patch so girls can work too.\n\nUnlike hybrids, dryad girls have no job restrictions and can do anything that all human hybrids combined can do. However, the rollback of these capabilities takes longer than specialized hybrids.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About race (Valkyries)
ConceptDef.description:
For a basic introduction to the rimworld, the Valkyries are not well suited because they are less fastidious, less likely to get sick, less likely to break down, more tenacious and generally smart and beautiful. However, this does not make them invulnerable.

If you lose a pawn, this is sad and insulting, but you can quickly find a replacement in its place, in the event of the death of the Valkyrie, this is a tragedy for the colony. These girls are the best fighters and their adult representatives can stand alone against hundreds of enemies (Tested on a large insect hive). But in order to become truly invincible, the Valkyrie must live to be 20 years old, and the average age at which they spawn is 13-15. And the younger they are, the less tenacious they are.

The Valkyries have a number of flaws that I, the mod developer, are still working on. The first and most notable is the dress restrictions, Valks cannot wear normal clothes and it is not possible to equip them with armor, however fortunately they can wear hats, but they will not be visible.
ConceptDef.helpText:
For a basic introduction to the rimworld, the Valkyries are not well suited because they are less fastidious, less likely to get sick, less likely to break down, more tenacious and generally smart and beautiful. However, this does not make them invulnerable.

If you lose a pawn, this is sad and insulting, but you can quickly find a replacement in its place, in the event of the death of the Valkyrie, this is a tragedy for the colony. These girls are the best fighters and their adult representatives can stand alone against hundreds of enemies (Tested on a large insect hive). But in order to become truly invincible, the Valkyrie must live to be 20 years old, and the average age at which they spawn is 13-15. And the younger they are, the less tenacious they are.

The Valkyries have a number of flaws that I, the mod developer, are still working on. The first and most notable is the dress restrictions, Valks cannot wear normal clothes and it is not possible to equip them with armor, however fortunately they can wear hats, but they will not be visible.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About race (ELFs)
ConceptDef.description:
Unlike their older sisters, ELFs are very fragile. Any fight for them will end with the loss of their little limbs, and the settlement of these little helpers will not be able to fight normally.

However, these babes have a huge advantage in non-combat areas. Like the Valkyries, they grow and improve. And the older they are, the less sleep they need and the faster they work. They also have a significant bonus to psycast, they are not affected by entropy and always spawn with the first level of psylink.

A bonus to all this is that they spawn about once a year an Anemo tree seed. The seed can be eaten to get a psylink.
ConceptDef.helpText:
Unlike their older sisters, ELFs are very fragile. Any fight for them will end with the loss of their little limbs, and the settlement of these little helpers will not be able to fight normally.

However, these babes have a huge advantage in non-combat areas. Like the Valkyries, they grow and improve. And the older they are, the less sleep they need and the faster they work. They also have a significant bonus to psycast, they are not affected by entropy and always spawn with the first level of psylink.

A bonus to all this is that they spawn about once a year an Anemo tree seed. The seed can be eaten to get a psylink.

ConceptDef.label: WVC - About race (Dryad Mothers)
ConceptDef.description:
These girls, compared to their sisters, are incredibly strong. In close combat, they have a huge bonus to damage, and the ability to have a crowd of dryads in support (up to 6 pieces) makes them even stronger.

However, they are brutally slow. Even just moving around the base, they do it slowly, in order to be in time for the start of the battle, they need to be sent there in advance, as soon as the enemy appears on the map. Despite almost impenetrable natural armor and huge HP compared to humans, they have a debuff to fire protection, which makes them vulnerable to flamethrowing enemies.

They are not vulnerable to extreme temperatures, but they make them even slower. Mothers will also spawn Gauranlen seeds.

Like other girls from my mod, they become stronger with age, however, their vulnerability to fire also increases.

However, they are brutally slow. Despite almost impenetrable natural armor and huge HP compared to humans, they have a debuff to fire protection, which makes them vulnerable to flamethrowing enemies.

They are not vulnerable to extreme temperatures, but they make them even slower. Mothers will also spawn Gauranlen seeds.

Like other girls from my mod, they become stronger with age, however, their vulnerability to fire also increases.
